text: <@U1JAPLQSY> thats a good question. It seems that a file storage service could be a useful component, and its a good topic to discuss. We could go down the path of incorporating a particular file system, or we could incorporate an abstraction layer, and let implementations/deployments choose their favorite file-system. Thoughts?
Folks, please indicate your availability for the Arch-WG Documentation working sessions next week here: <http://doodle.com/poll/5b5xevviwu2af68a>

attachments.title: Doodle: Hyperledger Arch-WG Documentation
attachments.text: Doodle radically simplifies the process of scheduling events, meetings, appointments, etc. Herding cats gets 2x faster with Doodle. For free!

text: I've created a google drive folder for the Arch-WG: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0LDRc8NJEgVellnLVEyWERYNlU>
And the outline for the Arch-doc: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=1bdr4MdnpUvv_3jN5DYSNp1ctjKGPH7K_yiMSQYcwBBo>
